File /secure/simul_efun/shuffle.c

Cotains some simul_efuns.

Written by Pinkfish

Method index

shuffle(mixed *)
This method randomizes an array.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
shuffle
mixed * shuffle(mixed * args)
This method randomizes an array. It places all the elements of an array back in random order.

Parameters:
args - the array to shuffle
Returns:
the randomized array
See also:
roll_MdN() and efun::random()
